availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ohio soldier. Married to Mary E. Cahill. Served in the 1st Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as captain, major, and lieutenant colonel from June 6, 1861 to August 17, 1863. Wounded at the Battle of Pittsburg Landing, Tennessee on April 7, 1862. Served in the 23rd and 24th Regiments of the Veteran Reserve Corps as colonel.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 914.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 153.
U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Application #316,579, Certificate #240,743.
